testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access the loan plan details of a user with a specified ID via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with valid authorization information and a non-existent 'id' is sent to
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/loanplans/details/2211" path parameters........passed Then The API user records the response returned from the api loanplans details endpoint and verifies that the status code is '400'.passed

testcase.system-out:
Given The API user sets "api/loanplans/details/22" path parameters..........passed And The API user records the response from the api loanplans details endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then Verify the information of the one with the index 0 in the API user response body: 47, 33, "QA Education", "Education", "25000.00000000", "50000.00000000", "10.00", 2, 12, "1000.00000000", "5.00000000", "
", 2, "100.00000000", "5.00000000", 0, 1, "2023-12-11T01:40:09.000000Z", "2023-12-11T01:40:09.000000Z".passed
